lines.text: Listen, I don't know what you've heard about me, but, ehm...

"That bloody Jane Tennison, she'll be storming into your nick, the balls of your best officers trailing from her jaws, spraying people with claret, calling people Masons, threatening resignation..." Well, I... I just wanted to tell you I'm not a complete maniac.
And Henry, don't call me ma'am. Call me boss, gov, anything but ma'am.
It isn't just your snottiness that precedes you, Jane. You're a role model and an icon on the force.
Oh, Campbell, you said you wanted law and order. Do you remember that?
Yeah, I do too. You'll never get it unless you tell the truth. It's as simple as that.
Now, I didn't actually hear you read me rights, Did I miss that? Am I under arrest?
No, if you want me to leave just say so. I wont actually go but I know saying so will make you feel like a big boy.
Just because you don't come Jane, don't take it out on me.
Jesus Jane, I want you now.
Well so does the desk sargeant, and asked me first.
